title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How SoFi Achieved Agentless, Multi-Region Data Protection & Lower TCO (COP204)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - SoFi如何实现无代理、多区域数据保护并降低总拥有成本 (COP204)
abstract: In highly regulated industries, data resilience and agility can’t come at the expense of each other. Learn how SoFi built multi-region data protection that adapts to compliance changes instantly—without compliance risk or slowing innovation. You’ll see how Eon’s 100% agentless, cloud-native platform turns static backups into a live, queryable asset, and how SoFi used it to scale across five AWS regions in weeks. The session closes with a live demo: see how Eon provides instant, cross-cloud recovery and real-time backup data insights. This presentation is brought to you by Eon, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 在高度监管的行业中，数据弹性和敏捷性不能相互牺牲。了解SoFi如何构建多区域数据保护，能够即时适应合规变化——既不产生合规风险，也不减缓创新速度。您将看到Eon的100%无代理、云原生平台如何将静态备份转变为实时可查询资产，以及SoFi如何利用它在几周内扩展到五个AWS区域。会议最后将进行现场演示：展示Eon如何提供即时跨云恢复和实时备份数据洞察。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Eon提供。
